org.lainsoft.forge.flow.helper

Class GenericViewHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lainsoft.forge.flow.helper.GenericViewHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewHelper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AjaxViewHelper

    public class GenericViewHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewHelper
    A Generic implementation of ViewHelper. You can extend or wrap this class to create an specific ViewHelper that suits your needs.

      • real_path

        public java.lang.String real_path(java.lang.String seudo_path)
        Description copied from interface: ViewHelper
        Returns the web application file system path for the seudo path given. For example:
        - helper.real_path("/WEB-INF/web.xml"); will return /my_file_system/path/.../app_server/my_webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml
        Specified by:
        real_path in interface ViewHelper
        Parameters:
        seudo_path - the seudo path to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The real file system path for the seudo path.
